hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 96 in today's
episode I have a new word for you gastly
let's find out what it means and how you
can use it in your daily conversation
gastly have you ever feared anything or
found something to be extremely awful
the word ghastly basically means
something that is very horrible dreadful
or unpleasant when something is
terrifying shocking horror or very
serious it is ghastly if someone looks
very ill especially with a pale face
they have a ghastly appearance for
example if the wallpaper in your room is
very ugly and unpleasant to look at it
is a ghastly wallpaper the word ghastly
is an adjective as it describes
something of being very horrible or
unpleasant being an adjective it has its
degree of comparisons the positive form
is ghastly the comparative form is
ghastly ER and the superlative degree is
ghastliest the word ghastly is also used
as an adverb and the word ghastliness is
a noun okay now that you know what
ghastly means let's take a look at some
example sentences to see how you can use
it in your daily conversation
example one after the Christmas party
Catherine's kitchen was a ghastly mess
example till disclosing personal details
about your income and investments to the
telly callers is the ghastliest mistake
one can make example 3 when Mary saw the
road accident she had a ghastly
expression on her face example for
today's newspaper has given all the
ghastly details of the murder that
happened in the neighbourhood example 5
Rochelle opted for a ghastly zombie look
for her fancy dress competition example
6 little Ben woke up crying in the
middle of the ghastly dream his mother
rushed into his room to console him
example 7 the weather wasn't ghastly
yesterday so it was safe to parasail
example 8 Brian had ghastly wounds
caused by the stone pelting during the
riot on the street example 9 the entire
neighbourhood filed a complaint with the
police when they saw a ghastly looking
man wandering in their area that's the
end of today's episode
what is the ghastliest situation you
have ever encountered and how did you
handle it kindly share your experiences
in the comment box below this video
